HDG.ID.content: the frame (Ge-stell) as a 2nd forgetting [?], prevents even Being of beings as presence > w/in Ge-stell must experience (erfahren) strange ownership/appropriation in which man & Being are delivered over to each other, must enter into Ereignis (event of appropriation), the word Ereignis [“the words” in English translation] should speak as a key term in service of thinking [via dissemination, Derrida deconstructs “key”] > Ereignis as singulare tantum, happens only in singular, not in any number, uniquely (einzig)

HDG.ID.content: [push through frame to Ereignis > but frame is prelude to Ereignis] turn to more original appropriating, turn frame into Ereignis, appropriate recovery, never produced by man alone, of the world of technology from its dominance back to servitude in realm by which man reaches more truly into Ereignis

HDG.ID.content: Ereignis, very nearness of neighborhood in which we already reside [Augustine], Ereignis (vibrating w/in itself) [not causa sui? auto-affection], where man & Being achieves their active nature [Spinoza], by losing qualities w/ which metaphysics endowed them
HDG.ID.linkedContent: Ereignis, very nearness of neighborhood in which we already reside [Augustine], Ereignis (vibrating w/in itself) [not causa sui? auto-affection], where man & Being achieves their active nature [Spinoza], by losing qualities w/ which metaphysics endowed them

HDG.ID.content: Das Ereignis als Er-eignis denken, heisst, am Bau dieses in sich schwingenden Bereiches bauen (to think appropriation as Ereignis means to contribute to this self-vibrating realm), a self-suspended structure (in sich schwebenden Bau) > thinking receives tools for this from language (Sprache), the most delicate, most susceptible vibration that holds everything w/in suspended structure of the Ereignis

motif.title: HIEROGLYPH / PASIGRAPHY / LEIBNIZ / CHINESE / UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE

HDG.ID.content: essence of identity is property of Ereignis > a departure from Being as ground of beings that springs into abyss, but not empty nothingness, this abyss is Ereignis > principle of identity means a spring required by essence of identity to attain essential light of Ereignis > Ereignis vibrates active nature of what speaks as language, once called House of Being [dissemination?]

HDG.ID.content: Ge-stell: mutual challenge of man & Being to enter calculation of what is calculable > were Ge-stell to address itself to us as Ereignis, which first surrenders man & Being to their own being, path open to experience beings in more originary way [halfwayness doesn’t cut it]

HDG.BC.content: history (arbitrarily), happening (Ereignis) of a decision about essence of truth, Ereignis is exceptional > man fails to see/recognize simple history: confused/habituated to multiplicity of ordinary [Mitsein] > remembrance of the inception: readiness for what is to come > distinguish what does matter from what doesn’t (groundless): let us allow ourselves to be struck by incipient
HDG.BC.linkedContent: history (arbitrarily), happening (Ereignis) of a decision about essence of truth, Ereignis is exceptional > man fails to see/recognize simple history: confused/habituated to multiplicity of ordinary [Mitsein] > remembrance of the inception: readiness for what is to come > distinguish what does matter from what doesn’t (groundless): let us allow ourselves to be struck by incipient

HDG.FS.content: can one say “Being is enowned through enowning (Sein ist durch das Ereignis ereignet)?” answer: yes > question of Ereignis [beyond Seinsfrage?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: can one say “Being is enowned through enowning (Sein ist durch das Ereignis ereignet)?” answer: yes > question of Ereignis [beyond Seinsfrage?]

HDG.WL.content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

HDG.WL.content: das Ereignis ereignet in seinem Er-äugen des Meschenwesens die Sterblichen [in beholding human nature, Ereignis makes mortals appropriate for…] > Ereignis releases man into his own: the sounding of the word > w/in the way, which belongs to essence of language, peculiar property of language is concealed: der Weg ist ereignend

HDG.WL.content: silence, often considered source of speaking, is itself a corresponding > das Ereignis ist sagend [Ereignis is by way of Saying]
